acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should handle both native and wrapped double values with @PodamDoubleValue annotation
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldHandleDoubleValuesWithThePodamDoubleValueAnnotation

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.annotations.DoubleValuePojo
Then the Object should not be null
Then the double value (0} should be greater or equal than 0.0
Then the double value 90.03135334373681 should be lower or equal than 100.0
Then the double value 893.5327193642246 should be between 0.0 and 1000.0
Then the double value 10.1245 should be exactly 10.1245
Then the Object should not be null
Then the double value 10.1245 should be exactly 10.1245
